title: Parent-Child Relationships to Children
description: How to get list of parent-child relationships to children of a person.

response.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<fs:familysearch xmlns="http://gedcomx.org/v1/" xmlns:fs="http://familysearch.org/v1/" xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom">
    <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP0-PP1" rel="person" title="Conclusions"/>
    <relationship type="http://gedcomx.org/ParentChild" id="FPPP0-PP0">
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP0-PP3" rel="child" title="Conclusions"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP0-PP1" rel="father" title="Conclusions"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP0-PP1" rel="parent" title="Conclusions"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP0-PP1" rel="person1" title="Conclusions"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP0-PP3" rel="person2" title="Conclusions"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/parent-child-relationships/PPP0-PP0" rel="relationship" title="Parent-Child Relationship"/>
        <identifier type="http://familysearch.org/v1/ChildAndParentsRelationship">https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/child-and-parents-relationships/PPP0-PP0</identifier>
        <person1 resource="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP0-PP1" resourceId="PPP0-PP1"/>
        <person2 resource="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP0-PP3" resourceId="PPP0-PP3"/>
    </relationship>
    <relationship type="http://gedcomx.org/ParentChild" id="FPPP1-PP0">
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP1-PP3" rel="child" title="Conclusions"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP0-PP1" rel="father" title="Conclusions"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP0-PP1" rel="parent" title="Conclusions"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP0-PP1" rel="person1" title="Conclusions"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP1-PP3" rel="person2" title="Conclusions"/>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/parent-child-relationships/PPP1-PP0" rel="relationship" title="Parent-Child Relationship"/>
        <identifier type="http://familysearch.org/v1/ChildAndParentsRelationship">https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/child-and-parents-relationships/PPP1-PP0</identifier>
        <person1 resource="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP0-PP1" resourceId="PPP0-PP1"/>
        <person2 resource="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP1-PP3" resourceId="PPP1-PP3"/>
    </relationship>
</fs:familysearch>
